attributes.action: Make young people able to start sport shooting at an earlier age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition to make young people in England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland able to hold a valid Firearms Certificate, and with it safely sport shoot using shotguns, low calibre rifles (.223) and air guns (Whilst holding a valid Firearms Certificate and in a safe environment, for example a shooting club) at an earlier age, of 14 years old.
